channel.title: Need more monster drops for your 317 server? Look here! NPCDrops.cfg!
channel.description:
My NPCDrops.cfg (For any EvolutionX server/other servers, don't know which.) Not fully finished yet, but this is just a start for a server which would like a stable economy. I cannot guarentee that you will get a stable economy, so if you don't like it, don't comment and just trow it away (or edit it :)). [b]When you've downloaded the .rar, extract it and place the NPCDrops.cfg into your server directory --> config, and overwrite it.[/b] Small tut on how and where to put it: Copy the NPCDrops.cfg file [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/npqbms.png[/img] Go into your server directory [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2a6l06x.png[/img] Enter the ''config'' map [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2dm7ccz.png[/img] Paste the NPCDrops.cfg file into the map [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/s12grq.png[/img] Overwrite the file. [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2dr8kls.png[/img] Now compile your server. If you don't know how to compile, copy this code into a textdocument and save it as .bat (In your server directory) You should edit the bold text the way your java is installed.
@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "[b]D:[/b]\Program Files\Java\[b]jdk1.6.0_20[/b]\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Just wait until a text comes: ''Enter a key to continue.'' Then your server is ready! [b]Tip: Use the EvolutionX V5 Source by Xx Weed Xx
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440005.0.html
[/b] Download it here (v1):
http://www.multiupload.com/X1DLYA6BCA or http://sharemole.com/0rq6pwyt/
Download v2 here:
http://sharemole.com/1mt3zivj/ or http://www.multiupload.com/97XK5L2N0N
Download v3 here:
http://www.multiupload.com/55R24JX4EX or http://sharemole.com/1hf1d6tw/
Password: [code]forgottenpkerz.tk[/code] [b]v2 Update: #Added Hellhound. #Added Red and Blue dragon #Added Lesser and Greater Demons (Many new drops added!) v3 Update: #Added Ice Giant and Fire Giant #Added Ice Queen and Nezikchened #Added Black Demon #Added Man and Woman #Added Fire Elemental, Air Elemental, Earth Elemental and Water Elemental #Removed the Barrows-NPC's cause they only drop crap, I'll have to re-write the drops.[/b] The list with drops and percentages (v3 of my .cfg drop list): [code]//Written by 1500. //abbysal small pouch x1 40% medium pouch x1 30% large pouch x1 20% giant pouch x1 10% rune essence x10 30% bones x1 100% //bat bat bones x1 100% giant bat wing x1 30% //goblin bones x1 100% goblin mail x1 60% //tzhaar tzhaar-ket-om x1 20% tokz-ket-xil x1 20% obsidian cape x1 20% tokkul x150 50% fire cape x1 1% //wolfman ashes x1 100% wolf bones x1 100% //wolfwoman ashes x1 100% wolf bones x1 100% //zombie bronze axe x1 25% bones x1 100% rune battleaxe x1 35% //general graardor (bandos) bones x1 100% armadyl godsword x1 3% saradomin sword x1 3% barrelchest anchor x1 3% saradomin godsword x1 3% zamorak godsword x1 3% bandos godsword x1 3% bandos tassets x1 2% bandos chestplate x1 2% dragon claws x1 3% //mithril dragon dragon full helm x1 5% dragon fire shield x1 3% super strength(4) x1 50% super attack(4) x1 50% super defence(4) x1 50% super attack(4) x1 50% dragon bones x1 100% //white knight white 2h sword x1 25% white scimitar x1 25% white platebody x1 20% white full helm x1 20% white platelegs x1 20% white plateskirt x1 20% white kiteshield x1 20% bones x1 100% //chaos elemental saradomin godsword x1 3% vesta chainbody x1 7% vesta plateskirt x1 7% vesta longsword x1 10% morrigan coif x1 7% statius platebody x1 5% statius platelegs x1 5% statius full helm x1 5% statius war hammer x1 7% dragon 2h sword x1 15% super strength x1 50% super attack x1 50% super defence x1 50% ashes x1 100% //nechryael rune boots x1 20% dragon boots x1 10% bones x1 100% //khazard khazard helmet x1 100% khazard armour x1 100% bones x1 100% //khazard general khazard helmet x1 100% khazard armour x1 100% bones x1 100% //elf warriors crystal bow full x1 10% crystal shield full x1 7% adamant platelegs x1 20% adamant plateskirt x1 20% adamant platebody x1 20% adamant med helm x1 20% bones x1 100% ice arrows x100 15% //green dragon ancient staff x1 10% dragon battleaxe x1 10% dragon med helm x1 15% dragon platelegs x1 10% dragon plateskirt x1 10% onyx necklace x1 5% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% anti-dragon shield x1 80% dragon bones x1 100% //dark beast dark bow x1 5% dragon scimitar x1 15% rune full helm x1 20% rune platelegs x1 20% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //king black dragon bandos tassets x1 3% bandos chestplate x1 3% zamorak godsword x1 3% anti-dragon shield x1 80% dragon med helm x1 10% ranger boots x1 5% robin hood hat x1 5% rune platelegs x1 20% dragon scimitar x1 12% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% dragon bones x1 100% //kalphite queen dragon chainbody x1 8% 95k coins x1 60% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% dragon defender x1 3% dragon spear x1 10% dragon mace x1 9% dragon necklace x1 1% dragon boots x1 9% dragon platelegs x1 8% dragon plateskirt x1 8% dragon full helm x1 4% //abbyssal demon abbyssal whip x1 5% dragon scimitar x1 15% rune full helm x1 20% rune platelegs x1 20% clue scroll x1 10% ashes x1 100% //dust devil 12k coins x1 20% dragon med helm x1 15% clue scroll x1 10% dragon chainbody x1 6% ashes x1 100% //turoth rune kiteshield x1 20% //jelly book of balance x1 10% holy book x1 10% unholy book x1 10% mithril full helm x1 45% //basilisk bones x1 100% nature tiara x1 10% //skeleton bones x1 100% blood tiara x1 10% //dagganoth cape x1 30% cape x1 30% cape x1 30% dragon halberd x1 15% adamant scimitar x1 25% rune 2h sword x1 20% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //gargoyle granite maul x1 10% dragon halberd x1 13% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //hill giants rune full helm x1 20% rune platebody x1 20% rune platelegs x1 20% rune plateskirt x1 20% amulet of strength x1 15% cape x1 15% cape x1 15% cape x1 15% dragon scimitar x1 10% rune 2h sword x1 18% dragon med helm x1 9% dragon sq shield x1 10% big bones x1 100% //sara wizard master wand x1 6% mage's book x1 8% saradomin staff x1 6% saradomin cape x1 9% druid's robe x1 50% druid's robe x1 50% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //zamorak wizard master wand x1 6% mage's book x1 8% zamorak staff x1 6% zamorak cape x1 9% zamorak robe x1 50% zamorak robe x1 50% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //guthix wizard master wand x1 6% mage's book x1 8% guthix staff x1 6% guthix cape x1 9% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //moss giant rune full helm x1 20% rune platebody x1 20% rune platelegs x1 20% rune plateskirt x1 20% amulet of strength x1 15% cape x1 15% cape x1 15% cape x1 15% dragon scimitar x1 10% rune 2h sword x1 18% dragon med helm x1 9% dragon sq shield x1 10% big bones x1 100% //dagganoth supreme rune crossbow x1 20% archer ring x1 6% dragon axe x1 15% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //dagganoth prime rune crossbow x1 20% seers ring x1 6% dragon axe x1 15% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //dagganoth rex rune crossbow x1 20% warrior ring x1 4% berserker ring x1 6% dragon axe x1 15% clue scroll x1 10% clue scroll x1 10% bones x1 100% //chaos druid irit seed x4 60% kwuarm seed x6 60% cadantine seed x5 60% Lantadyme seed x6 60% dwarf weed seed x4 60% ranarr seed x6 60% snapdragon seed x5 60% toadflax seed x4 60% vial of water(noted) x20 50% //rock crabs clue scroll x1 30% bronze arrowtips x50 20% iron arrowtips x50 20% steel arrowtips x50 20% mithril arrowtips x50 20% adamant arrowtips x50 20% rune arrowtips x50 20% desert shirt x1 8% desert robes x1 8% desert boots x1 8% cooking gauntlets x1 8% //kalphite guardian black platebody (g) x1 5% black platelegs (g) x1 5% black full helm (g) x1 5% black kiteshield (g) x1 5% bones x1 100% clue scroll x1 10% //hellhound uncut onyx x2 25% dragon 2h sword x1 15% amulet of fury x1 15% rock shell helm x1 8% rock shell plate x1 8% rock shell legs x1 8% rock shell boots x1 8% clue scroll x1 10% //red dragon spined helm x1 8% spined body x1 8% spined chaps x1 8% anti-dragon shield x1 40% spined boots x1 8% dragon bones x1 100% dragonfireshield x1 3% clue broodoo shield x1 7% //lesser demon tribal mask x1 8% villager robe x1 12% villager hat x1 12% villager sandals x1 12% villager armband x1 12% rune trownaxe x35 15% rune dart x75 15% rune javelin x1 15% rune knife x65 15% dragon sq shield x1 9% dragon spear(p) x1 8% dragon platelegs x1 6% dragon full helm x1 3% ashes x1 100% //greater demon dragon full helm x1 4% dragon platelegs x1 8% dragon chainbody x1 3% ashes x1 100% cooking gauntlets x1 40% dragon battleaxe x1 12% dragonstone ring x1 6% super strength(4) x1 35% super defence(4) x1 35% super antipoison(4) x1 35% super attack(4) x1 35% //ice giant ice arrows x50 30% ice gloves x1 12% new crystal bow x1 7% dragon platelegs x1 7% dragon full helm x1 4% big bones x1 100% //fire giant dragon full helm x1 4% dragon platelegs x1 7% staff of fire x1 35% antifire potion x1 40% big bones x1 100% //ice queen ice arrows x100 40% ice gloves x1 15% bow sword x1 3% disk of returning x1 2% easter egg x1 2% cape of legends x1 1% bones x1 100% //nezikchened bunny ears x1 5% dragon defender x1 5% rune defender x1 7% dragon halberd x1 15% bones x1 100% //black demon dragon platelegs x1 8% dagon hai hat x1 5% dagon hai bottom x1 5% dagon hai arrow shaft x100 40% headless arrow x100 35% boots of lightness x1 20% rune essence x100 40% rune dagger(p) x1 20% dragon longsword x1 12% rune scimitar x1 25% bones x1 100% //woman 30k coins x1 60% rune essence x100 40% rune spear(s) x1 20% rune spear(+) x1 20% rune dagger(p) x1 20% dragon longsword x1 12% rune scimitar x1 25% bones x1 100% //fire elemental copper ore x10 45% tin ore x10 45% iron ore x10 35% coal ore x10 30% silver ore x10 30% gold ore x10 25% mithril ore x10 20% adamantite ore x10 15% runite ore x10 10% bones x1 100% //earth elemental bronze bar x10 45% iron bar x10 35% steel bar x10 30% silver bar x10 30% gold bar x10 25% mithril bar x10 20% adamantite bar x10 15% runite bar x10 10% bones x1 100% //air elemental studded body(g) x1 5% studded body(t) x1 5% studded chaps(g) x1 5% studded chaps(t) x1 5% dragon hide body(g) x1 5% dragon hide body(t) x1 5% dragon hide chaps(g) x1 5% dragon hide chaps(t) x1 5% bones x1 100%[/code] If you like it, you can comment. If you don't like it, please don't comment, however if you got great ideas, comment :) 1500. [size=18pt][b]If you got more ideas for monsters, items and more, please post it here! Thanks alot![/b][/size]

item.title: Need more monster drops for your 317 server? Look here! NPCDrops.cfg!
item.description:
@1500 wrote:

My NPCDrops.cfg (For any EvolutionX server/other servers, don’t know which.)

Not fully finished yet, but this is just a start for a server which would like a stable economy.
I cannot guarentee that you will get a stable economy, so if you don’t like it, don’t comment and just trow it away (or edit it :)).

When you’ve downloaded the .rar, extract it and place the NPCDrops.cfg into your server directory --> config, and overwrite it.
Small tut on how and where to put it:
Copy the NPCDrops.cfg file

Go into your server directory

Enter the ‘‘config’’ map

Paste the NPCDrops.cfg file into the map

Overwrite the file.

Now compile your server. If you don’t know how to compile, copy this code into a textdocument and save it as .bat (In your server directory)
You should edit the bold text the way your java is installed.

@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "[b]D:[/b]\Program Files\Java\[b]jdk1.6.0_20[/b]\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Just wait until a text comes: ''Enter a key to continue.'' Then your server is ready!

[b]Tip: Use the EvolutionX V5 Source by Xx Weed Xx

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440005.0.html
[/b]

Download it here (v1):

http://www.multiupload.com/X1DLYA6BCA or http://sharemole.com/0rq6pwyt/

Download v2 here:

http://sharemole.com/1mt3zivj/ or http://www.multiupload.com/97XK5L2N0N

Download v3 here:

http://www.multiupload.com/55R24JX4EX or http://sharemole.com/1hf1d6tw/

Password:

forgottenpkerz.tk

[b]v2 Update:
#Added Hellhound.
#Added Red and Blue dragon
#Added Lesser and Greater Demons (Many new drops added!)

v3 Update:
#Added Ice Giant and Fire Giant
#Added Ice Queen and Nezikchened
#Added Black Demon
#Added Man and Woman
#Added Fire Elemental, Air Elemental, Earth Elemental and Water Elemental
#Removed the Barrows-NPC’s cause they only drop crap, I’ll have to re-write the drops.[/b]
